tool_description: Establishes and manages connections to candidate databases, validates access permissions, and monitors connection health for reliable data access.

database_type.description: Type of database system (SQL, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, ATS_API)

connection_string.description: Database connection string or endpoint URL

error_messages: Invalid database type: Use one of [SQL, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, ATS_API]
Connection failed: Check connection string format and network accessibility
Timeout exceeded: Reduce timeout_seconds or check database performance
Authentication failed: Verify credentials in connection string
usage: Provide database_type and connection_string to establish connection. Set timeout_seconds if default 30 seconds is insufficient. Returns connection status and performance metrics.

connection_status.description: Status of database connection (connected, failed, timeout)
